title: Age of Mythology: Retold Update 18.40371
description:
Welcome heroes to another exciting update, full of balance changes, minor fixes, and more! So take a peek at the notes and then jump in to the latest for Age of Mythology: Retold!

And if you didn't know already, Age of Mythology: Retold Premium Edition is available on PlayStation 5 right now!

title: Celebrating Age in 2025 and What’s Still to Come This Year!
description: It has been an incredibly busy 2025 so far for World’s Edge and the Age of Empires and Age of Mythology franchises, and as we cross the halfway mark together, we’d like to celebrate the amazing journey we’ve taken this year alongside our players. From record-breaking launches to community milestones and platform expansions, your passion and support have made the first … Continued

title: Pre-Order Heavenly Spear, for Age of Mythology: Retold!
description: Praise the gods, and prepare yourself for the next DLC for Age of Mythology: Retold – Heavenly Spear and, for a limited time, pre-order to get 15% off! Worship the gods, command new heroes, and summon the yokai of Japan in an all-new expansion: Heavenly Spear. Play a sweeping 12-mission campaign, wield the powers of … Continued

title: Age of Empires IV – Patch 14.1.5602
description: Greetings, Age of Empires IV community! We hope you’re staying cool and hydrated this summer. We’re coming at you with a nice, refreshing new patch for the season! We are pretty happy with where gameplay is right now, so we aren’t going to be introducing a ton of new balance changes. That said, we’re always … Continued

title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – Update 147949
description: Welcome to another update for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition! This will bring some balance changes and bug fixes based on your feedback. Thanks again to our amazing community members, all of whom have helped to make Age of Empires what it is today! —The Age of Empires Team Please note that custom mods may not be compatible with … Continued
